subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Belgium’s chances in the World Cup sustained a major blow when striker Christian Benteke was ruled out of the event after rupturing his Achilles’ tendon while training with the English Premier League team Aston Villa.
snippet: Belgium’s chances in the World Cup sustained a major blow when striker Christian Benteke was ruled out of the event after rupturing his Achilles’ tendon while training with the English Premier League team Aston Villa.
